mobiles.name: oldstyle dwarf guard
mobiles.description: The guard looks very tough and mean.

mobiles.name: oldstyle dwarf worker miner
mobiles.long_description: A dwarven mining worker is here.
mobiles.description: He is very dirty, and looks extremely over-worked.

mobiles.name: oldstyle wraith
mobiles.long_description: A wraith is awaiting your first move here.

mobiles.name: oldstyle storekeeper
mobiles.long_description: There is the Hide & Tooth storekeeper standing here, waiting patiently.
mobiles.description: The storekeeper is very rotund, but looks like a sharp guy.

mobiles.name: oldstyle baker
mobiles.long_description: Granite Head, the baker, is waiting for a customer here.
mobiles.description: Granite Head is covered with flour and grains.

mobiles.name: oldstyle lizard
mobiles.description:
This scaly creature looks like it is well adapted to it's underground
habitat.  He looks very powerful.

mobiles.name: oldstyle giant
mobiles.description: The giant is about 8 feet tall, with arms of steel, and looks very strong.

mobiles.name: oldstyle dwarf miner
mobiles.description: The mineworker is very tired, and very dirty, and he has bulging muscles.

mobiles.name: oldstyle dwarf leader
mobiles.long_description: A dwarven mine leader is here.
mobiles.description: The mine leader is very big and very strong.

mobiles.name: oldstyle dwarf doctor
mobiles.description: He is a very skilled surgeon, with hands of steel.

mobiles.name: oldstyle dwarf peon
mobiles.long_description: A dwarven peon is awaiting help here.

mobiles.name: oldstyle dwarf son
mobiles.long_description: An unwanted son is here.  You feel sorry for the guy.

mobiles.name: oldstyle dwarf daughter
mobiles.long_description: An unwanted daughter is here.  You feel sorry for her.

mobiles.name: oldstyle man
mobiles.long_description: A man in waiting is here.  He looks nervous and unsure of himself.

mobiles.name: oldstyle snake
mobiles.long_description: There is a giant snake here.

objects.name: key green
objects.description: A deep green key is on the floor.

objects.name: dwarven hammer
objects.description: There is a dwarven hammer laying here.

objects.name: dwarven plate
objects.description: There is dwarven plate mail laying here.

objects.name: stick
objects.description: There is a long, black stick lying here.

objects.name: stick
objects.description: There is a long, black stick here.

objects.name: club
objects.description: There is a dwarven club laying here.

objects.name: two-handed dwarven axe
objects.description: A two-handed Dwarven axe is here.

objects.name: ring golden dwarven
objects.description: A pretty golden ring is here.

extra_descriptions.description:
It seems to be a hot love letter from the Queen.  Unfortunately,
it's not suitable for transmission across a public data network.

objects.name: castle key
objects.description: There is a key to Strangelove Castle here.

objects.name: key mine
objects.description: There is a key to the mines here.

objects.name: coal
objects.description: There is a chunk of coal here.

objects.name: pick
objects.description: There is a mining pick here.

objects.name: pills
objects.short_description: a box of birth control pills
objects.description: There is a box of birth control pills here.

extra_descriptions.description:
They are in a circular container, and there are numbers corresponding
to the day that they are to be taken.  You can tell they haven't been
used for a while.

objects.name: map castle strangelove
objects.description: A rolled up map is here.

extra_descriptions.description:
.
* * * Castle Strangelove * * *       __________
 = = ==================== = =        \ Queen's \
                                      \ Bedroom \
                                       \_________\
                                                *
                               __________    ____\_____
     North  Up                 \  Top of \    \ Waiting \
        \   |                   \ Stairs  \----\  Room   \
          \ |                    \_________\    \_________\
  West ---- + ---- East             |
            | \                _____|____
            |   \              \         \
          Down  South           \ Stairs  \    [] - You need the Castle Key
                                 \_________\        to get beyond this point.
                                    |               The Castle Key can be
                               _____|____           found on the Grinning
                               \         \          Dwarves in the Barracks.
                                \ Stairs  \
                                 \_________\    * - You need the Deep Green
                                    |               Key to get beyond this
                __________     _____|____           point.  This key can be
                \ Door to \    \ Inside  \          found on the Wraith in
                 \ Castle  \-[]-\ Castle  \         the wine cellar or on one
                  \_________\    \_________\        of the Dwarven Guards on
                           \                        the Dark path.
                         ____\_____
                         \ Path to \
                          \ Castle  \
                           \_________\
                                    \
                   __________     ____\_____
                   \ Door to \    \ Path to \
                    \ Kingdom \----\ Castle  \
                     \_________\    \_________\
                              \
                           To Dwarven
                             Kingdom

rooms.name: Path to Dwarven Village
rooms.description:
All around you are the mountains of the southern range, home of dwarves and 
giants.  You can climb back down the mountains to the west and leave these 
realms, or seek riches in the northern mineshafts.  A dirt road leads south, 
towards a small building.  You can hear crying and shrieking coming from it.

exits.exit_description: You hear the patter of little feet.
A rocky road leads back to Midgaard and the mines of Moria.

rooms.name: Path, base of mountain
rooms.description:
Now you are at the bottom of a rugged mountain.  The forest around you is
very dense, and it seems very dark to the north.

exits.exit_description: The path continues up the mountain.
The path heads toward the main city.

rooms.name: Path, middle of mountain
rooms.description:
Standing on the middle of the mountain, you can easily see the turning
point to the south, and the top of the mountain is very near to the north.

exits.exit_description: The top of the mountain is easily seen from here.
The base of the mountain is near.

rooms.name: Top of mountain
rooms.description:
You are now on the top of the mountain.  To the south you see a path
leading down the mountain.  To the east and west you see entrances to
what seems like mines.

exits.exit_description: An entrance to the mountain which seems to lead underground.
The path leads down the mountain to the main city.
There is an entrance to the mountain.

rooms.name: Narrow Path
rooms.description:
This is a narrow path leading to the Dwarven Kingdom.  It looks less
travelled than the others, and it is very creepy.  The path opens up
to the south, and continues to the north.

rooms.name: Entrance to Mountain
rooms.description:
Here is an entrance to the mountain.  The door looks very well built,
and you can hear noise coming from within.

rooms.name: Bend in Narrow Path
rooms.description:
This is a narrow path that bends to the east here.  The trees hang over
the path, and it is very overgrown.  The narrow path continues to the
south and to the east.

extra_descriptions.description: They hang over the road in the most ominous of ways.

rooms.name: Narrow path
rooms.description: This path is very narrow, and it continues to the north and west.

rooms.name: Narrow north-south path
rooms.description:
This path leads to the north and south.  To the north you can see a
door, and to the south the path continues.

rooms.name: Door to Kingdom
rooms.description:
Here the path turns to the west.  You can see a door in front of you,
and the path continues to the west and south.

rooms.name: Path to the Castle
rooms.description:
You are on a path that will eventually lead to the castle.  It
continues north to the castle, and there is a door on the western wall.

rooms.name: Still on the path to the Castle
rooms.description:
You are still on the path to the castle, or back to the
Dwarven village, whichever way you wish to go.  The path
continues to the north and south.

rooms.name: Door to Castle
rooms.description:
Here there is a door to the castle to the east.  The castle
is elegantly designed, and looks much like a roll of toilet paper
standing on end.  A sign says:

              ******************************************
              *  WELCOME TO THE CASTLE OF STRANGELOVE  *
              *      Here, celibacy is uninvited       *
              ******************************************

rooms.name: Inside the entrance
rooms.description:
Everything here is covered in soot and very grimy.  The path continues
to the east and north, and there is a door to the west.

exits.exit_description: The little underground path continues to the north.
The path leads outside the entrance.
This looks like an entrance to some type of store room.

rooms.name: Path
rooms.description:
You are on a path in the dwarven village which leads north to the shops
and south to the corner of the area.

rooms.name: Turn in road
rooms.description:
You are on a path that leads to a Hide & Tooth shop to the west, and the
path continues to the south.

exits.exit_description: The Hide & Tooth shop is seen to the west.

rooms.name: Hide & Tooth Shop
rooms.description:
You are in the Hide & Tooth shop.  Here you may buy the finest in Dwarven
weapons and armors. The path continues to the north and east.

rooms.name: Path to the north of shop
rooms.description:
You are on a path to the north of the Hide & Tooth shop.  The path continues
to the north, and there is Granite Head's bakery to the west.

rooms.name: North of Shops
rooms.description:
Here the path bends to the east towards the barracks. To the
south you can see the shops.

rooms.name: Path by Hospital
rooms.description:
Here the path passes by the Hospital to the north.  It continues
to the east to the barracks, and to the west.

rooms.name: Path next to barracks
rooms.description: Here the path continues west, and east to the barracks.

rooms.name: Entrance to barracks
rooms.description:
Here there is an entrance to the barracks to the south, and
the path continues to the west.

rooms.name: Guard House
rooms.description:
You are in the guard house to the west of the entrance
to the castle.  There are nude posters covering the walls.

extra_descriptions.description: There is a wall poster of a nude Minne Pearl.

rooms.name: First Barrack room
rooms.description:
Here is the first of two main rooms of barracks.  The
barracks continue to the south, and you can leave the room
to the north.

rooms.name: Back of Barracks
rooms.description:
Here is the back of the dwarven barracks.  There are rows
of beds here, and there is a stench that is unbearable.

rooms.name: Inside of Castle Strangelove
rooms.description:
You are just inside the castle.  It is very tubular in shape,
and it is very featureless.  There is a set of stairs that lead
up, and the door leads out of the castle to the west.

rooms.name: A store room
rooms.description:
There is a layer of dust on the floor at least 3 inches thick!  It is
probable that not many people have been in here for many months.

exits.exit_description: A lighted area that looks like a well worn path.

extra_descriptions.description: After blowing all the dust off the floor, you notice a trapdoor!

rooms.name: Wine cellar
rooms.description:
This room smells like wine, and you can only assume it used to be
a wine cellar at one time.

rooms.name: Stairs in castle
rooms.description: The stairs continue to circle up and down here.

rooms.name: Stairs
rooms.description:
You are still circling around on the stairs.  You are starting to
get dizzy from going around and around and around and around and
around.  The stairs continue up and down.

rooms.name: Top of stairs
rooms.description:
You are at the top of the stairs in the castle.  There is an exit
to the east, and the stairs lead down.

rooms.name: Queen's waiting room
rooms.description:
This is the Queen's waiting room.  Here the men literally
'wait' for the queen.  You've heard that the queen really likes
to get to 'know' her people, in the biblical sense.  The queen's
bedroom is to the north, and you can see stairs to the west.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description:
This is the Queen's bedroom.  The bed is all ruffled, and there
is a stack of dirty sheets piled in the corner.

A note has been scrawled in lipstick on the mirror:

    I'm out looking for my birth control pills.
    Why don't you slip into something comfortable while you're waiting?

rooms.name: Hospital
rooms.description:
You are inside the Dwarven Hospital.  It smells like rubbing
alcohol, and there is blood all over the walls.

rooms.name: Granite Head's Bakery
rooms.description:
The aroma coming from this room is sensuous.  You can almost taste
the pastries dissolving in your mouth.

rooms.name: Dark path
rooms.description:
This path is very well worn, and there is an entrance to the mines to the
east, while the path continues to the north and west.

rooms.name: Mine entrance
rooms.description:
The little path here leads down toward the mines, while the worn path
continues to the west.

rooms.name: Inside the mine
rooms.description:
There are holes everywhere from the places that the workers blew
away the rock to get to whatever they were looking for.  A path leads
down and up.

rooms.name: Path in the mine
rooms.description:
You are deep inside the mine, and you feel very uncomfortable.  The
path continues to the east, and leads to the mineshaft to the west.

rooms.name: Mine crossroad
rooms.description:
You are at a crossroad in the mine.  There is a door to the north,
and the path continues to the south, east, and west.

rooms.name: Coal Room
rooms.description:
You are inside the storage area for the raw materials
that are found down here.  The room is very unsturdy as the
supports are very rickety.

rooms.name: Mine Maze
rooms.description:
You have entered the maze of the mines.  To the east you
can see some inscriptions, and you can exit to the south.

rooms.name: Maze inscription
rooms.description: You are inside the maze, but not far enough in that you could get lost.

rooms.name: Maze
rooms.description: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: Maze
rooms.description: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: Maze
rooms.description: You are in a maze.

rooms.name: Mining equipment room
rooms.description:
This is the storage room for equipment used by the
Dwarven miners.  It is very small, and you can tell that
not many miners actually use any equipment.

rooms.name: Solved the Maze.
rooms.description:
You have solved the maze.  You can tell by the last few moves
that there is no way that a dumb worker could have figured that
out.  It seems pretty desolate here.  To the south is a bleak room.
To the north, you see the maze.  There is a sign above the south exit:

    Those who enter, plan on a timely death.
    Especially if you're loyal to the queen.

rooms.name: The Mazekeeper's Room
rooms.description:
You have entered the Mazekeeper's room.  There are pictures of
the Queen with darts thrown in it.  Spray-painted on the wall are
things like 'the queen shall suffer' and 'Catholics Rule'.

rooms.name: Bottom of mineshaft
rooms.description:
You are at the bottom of the mineshaft.  The air here is very sooty, and
it is very hard to breath.  The mineshaft leads up and east.

rooms.name: The mountains of the dwarven kingdom
rooms.description:
You are standing at the foot of the mountains of the dwarven kingdom, where
dwarves and giants toil endlessly to pry gems and mithril from the mother 
earth.  Here lies the palace of the dwarven queen, and untold riches.
But beware, for the mines are said to be haunted by demon and spirit alike.
The dwarven kingdom lies to the east.

exits.exit_description: You see the foothills of this mighty mountain range.
